mapper.insert: insert into ${prefix}_def_processdefinition (PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_KEY, CATEGORY, PROCESS_NAME, VERSION, RESOURCE_NAME, DEPLOYMENT_ID, DIAGRAM_RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_ID,START_FORM_KEY, REV_ ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deploymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagramResourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startFormUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1 )
mapper.select: select * from ${prefix}_DEF_PROCESSDEFINITION where PROCESS_KEY = #{processKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VERSION = (select max(VERSION) from ${prefix}_DEF_PROCESSDEFINITION where PROCESS_KEY = #{processKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select * from ${prefix}_DEF_PROCESSDEFINITION where DEPLOYMENT_ID = #{deploymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PROCESS_KEY = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from ${prefix}_DEF_PROCESSDEFINITION where PROCESS_KEY = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select * from (select max(VERSION) as VERSION,PROCESS_KEY from ${prefix}_DEF_PROCESSDEFINITION GROUP BY PROCESS_KEY ) t1 left join ${prefix}_DEF_PROCESSDEFINITION t2 on t1.VERSION=t2.VERSION and t1.PROCESS_KEY=t2.PROCESS_KEY
mapper.update: update ${prefix}_def_processdefinition set PROCESS_KEY = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPLOYMENT_ID = #{deploymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIAGRAM_RESOURCE_NAME = #{diagramResourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REV_ = #{revisionNext,jdbcType=INTEGER} where PROCESS_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REV_ = #{revision,jdbcType=INTEGER}
